text: The Perak-Ligor Siamese War was a war between the Perak Sultanate and the Ligor Kingdom, which was supported by Siam. This war was also linked to the Siamese attack on Kedah where the Ligor Army attacked the Perak Sultanate which ended with the victory of the Perak Sultanate with the help of the Selangor Sultanate. ==References== Category:19th-century conflicts Category:History of Malaysia Category:History of Thailand
